GameDrawEngine Class Reference

GameDrawEngine class handles the actual drawing of all the mesh/data passed into it in addition to handling setting the active camera. More...

Detailed Description

GameDrawEngine class handles the actual drawing of all the mesh/data passed into it in addition to handling setting the active camera.
